sub_title: Brand Building and Management Specialist | Creative Strategist | Founder of InstinKtive Studio | Label Manager at Tribal Music Group
summary:
“Adaptability enforces creativity, and creativity is adaptability.” - Pearl Zhu

An open-minded Brand Building and Management graduate capable of building, launching and managing brands in various industries. With particular ambition and expertise in merging the Marketing, entertainment, and music industry to transmedia design. I have always strived to come up with, as well as to perfect unique ideas that enrich brand narratives to every last detail. Achieving this through always keeping the full picture in mind and how every element comes together. Ultimately, being the driver that links creativity to any complex strategy.

I have reached this level of expertise by always continually striving to gain as much experience as possible along my journey of education. Through developing as well as discovering my passions in entrepreneurship and uplifting diverse projects. Entailing sharpening my skill sets in a variety of fields of brand positioning, marketing, analytics, publishing, distribution, art direction, business administration, content creation, social media and talent management.

awards.title: Winning Panel Concept and Format For International Music Summit Ibiza 2020
awards.description:
During my Dance industry minor studies at Fontys University, I have had the pleasure to work on an assignment for a special client, in that case, being IMS Ibiza. Over several weeks, I had to research, brainstorm and create a new concept for the IMS Ibiza conference edition 2020. With different requirements, at hand, the newly developed concept demanded to be produced uniquely, hopefully, distinguished from regular panel formats, and covering a topic that has not yet been discussed. The stimulation behind providing this assignment occurred where the client seeks content development and possible inspiration from uprising professionals in the industry and a fresh perspective on ongoing matters within the branch.

The assignment was presented in a competition format to the whole class and distributed between four groups of three to four students each, where only one group would be the winner and be able to work at the conference and potentially realise the designed concept. Alongside the concept creation itself, a full report had to be written, explaining each step of the way and defending the choices that were made. After careful considerations and pitching to the client, I am happy to share that my group won with the following topic:

"HOW EVOKING A GLOBAL CODE OF CONDUCT CAN TACKLE THE CORE CHALLENGES IN THE DANCE MUSIC INDUSTRY"

awards.description: I had achieved a bright spark award which resulted due to my end of year results being on average above a distinction. Which enabled a discount bursary for my final year of studies in my bachelors.

profile_positions.description:
I created InstinKtive Studio in response to the COVID 19 lockdown, as a music, as well as arts rooted multi-platform, database and catalogue. Dedicated to nurturing and facilitating the emerging discourses surrounding the effects of the pandemic on the arts and music industry. Following the initiative of showcasing as well as giving a voice to established and upcoming artists/entities. With the aims of co-creation and collaboration for the regenerative future of the respective industries during these transformative times. In turn, it also led to having  various internal clients within the music and arts industry and such label and publication mananagemnt to Tribal Music Group.

Initially, the lockdown conditions meant that I had to digitize my approach to events, artist promotion, programming, production, and marketing. It also currently leads to discovering and pushing continuous research in innovation, storytelling, design, technology, and building online as well as offline community engagement. 

Ultimately, cultivating transmedia tools in dedicating a section of this project to be a point of publication for sharing industry leaders’ stories. These are stories/perspectives from entities that match the values of being incredibly innovative and creative forces found within the systematic conflicts of the pandemic.
 
In recognition of this project, it ongoingly serves as a client to the Minor Dance Music Industry, Transmedia and 4th -Year - CBL students. Providing them with the opportunity to gain mandatory working hours in the exploration and research of what is still possible within these industries.

Responsibilities - Brand and project manager across recruited marketing, design, production, journalistic and technicality teams/departments. Overall leadership and decision-making within such departments. With associated responsibilities in setting up briefs, art direction, scheduling, logistics, artist management and interviewing industry leaders globally.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Specialised management across various labels and platforms within Tribal Music Group. Such as Tribal Trap, Diverge Records, Clout Nu, BassBoosterz & more. Tribal Music Group currently serves as a priority client under InstinKtive Studio.
profile_positions.title: Label Management

profile_positions.description:
For an assigned client colleagues and myself formed a multidisciplinary team briefed in creating a Transmedia campaign for a Belgium based pop star. The objectives included creating a stronger connection with his current audience while attracting more audiences of the millennial and generation Z group. With overall goals surrounding more reach as well as hype towards upcoming releases and Spotify playlists specified by the Universal Label Group. 

Additional immediate goals included an increase of following and subscriptions to newsletter mailing list. This was approached through carrying out research, analysis and the design thinking process. It was evident that the production to be carried out was to break the disconnect of how the artist presents himself on media verse the meaning behind his music.  Resulting in gaining a better relationship with his audiences in understanding his identity behind his works. While hand in hand, achieving the specified objectives and goals.

This innovatively and creatively took from as an interactive research group. Working within the realms as an online music enthusiast community. Following tools and principals of transmedia and narratology tactics. Motivated in telling and discovering the artist's story through an outside entity. 
Responsibilities - Contact person for manager/artist, market research, platform analysis, conceptualization, scripting, interviewee host and KPI analytics.
profile_positions.title: Transmedia Campaign Production

profile_positions.description:
Assisted United We Stream focusing within the Amsterdam based stream.

This was created to find innovative methods to raise funds and awareness towards differentiated music cultures and venues facing relentless damage from the pandemic. It also provided an opportunity to educate individuals about differentiated music cultures and nightlife found in different parts of the world.

Responsibilities - Providing innovative solutions for programming and creative methods to maximize viewers as well as donations. This also involved external research and looking within their schedule to create fast-paced agendas and programs.
profile_positions.title: Programming

profile_positions.description:
I was tasked to assist the VibeLab team by using their communication platforms and database to help develop a global interactive map. Which now provides data about the night-time economy and night time mayors in cities across the globe. This contributed to a critical time period where such industries were suffering the most. It was important to know who was in the same fight globally. 

This map is now live with special thanks for the good work. This is due to it playing a key role in making such a network more visible and understandable, which is especially important during these times.  There is an article from Harvard doctoral candidate Andreina Seijas, which gives special thanks to all involved, featuring the nighttime.org/map. Which Andreina and Mirik Milan co-wrote in being the original impetus for the nighttime.org interactive map. (Links to the article and map may be found attached)

Responsibilities - Gathering and confirming information regarding matters of transit permits, event permits, night time mayors and commissioners. Additionally, any external research around these matters contribution to the completion of the map.
profile_positions.title: Assistant in setting up global interactive map

profile_positions.location: City of Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
profile_positions.description:
I co-created the brand Mantra, which is a unique event facilitating the collaboration of Arts and Music. Involving the hosting of independent events and podcasts.  Including the hosting of a genre-specific themed stage at multi-genre festival/event.

Responsibilities - In charge of overseeing the events as well as podcasts including concept developments for brand building, image, marketing materials, and campaigns. I was also responsible for brand finances, production, logistics, sponsorships, musicians, and artists.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Colleagues and myself were tasked within our final year with a client brief by the staple South African woman's fashion brand Foschini. The aim was to create an all women's focused new campaign in multidisciplinary teams to obtain a differentiated brand positioning. Aimed at obtaining more of the generation Z market while maintaining their generation X clientele. Working within the (TFG) Foschini group database while following design thinking concepts in the research, design and creation of new strategies. Facilitating executed mockups for a creative roll-out campaign to be implemented by the company’s retail outlets.

Responsibilities - I had the role of researcher, data analyst and brand strategist. Providing the link between the strategy to the design team. As well as taking responsibility for being a main presenter to the panel and client.
profile_positions.title: Brand Challenge Campaign

profile_positions.description:
Similarly, to Brand Challenge, colleagues and myself were tasked with a client brief from SecretEATS. Known as the well- established, mysterious and exclusive dining events brand based in South Africa and Vietnam. The objectives were to use their existing allocated database and resources in the formation of a step by step-roll out campaign. To creatively market their next dining event working in their values of exclusivity and mystery. Following the processes of market analysis and design thinking.  


Responsibilities – I had the role of strategic brand strategist. Conducting extensive market research and analysis. Thereby converting existing data and found insights into the strategy translated to the concept. Furthermore, creating and scheduling a step-by-step plan executed to mockups with communication to the design and game development team. Additionally, taking the lead role in consultation with the relevant budgeting factors, influencers and presentation to the South African and Vietnam based client.
profile_positions.title: Brand Activation Campaign

profile_positions.description:
Colleagues and myself were tasked to create a pilot marketing campaign for Business Intelligence (BI) boot camp program. The objective was to have a specific focus on a marketing concept to target millennial and generation Z students. This was stipulated by specific education bodies to test how they may react to marketing a particular course on varied platforms. 

Responsibilities – Taking the initiative to devise a campaign strategy. Entailing, field research and communication with various stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Pilot marketing campaign

profile_positions.description:
Tasked in promoting the sales of search engine optimizations (SEO) products to local specified companies. The objective was to motivate the importance of SEO products and how BluBird may assist such companies in putting them on the map optimally. 

Responsibilities - Telephonically and physically visiting specifically listed companies by BluBird Interactive and explaining the use and importance of (SEO) products. This involved assisting with the acquisition and registration processes in communication with various stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Promotion and Sales
